name: Le Petit Papillon Montessori School
overview:
Le Petit Papillon Montessori School, under the direction of founder and Head of School Damarys Zarling, continues to enjoy a reputation as one of southeast Florida’s most prestigious educational institutions for young children. Committed to upholding the principles advocated by Dr. Maria Montessori, the school emphasizes the importance of experiential and sensory-based learning in order to generate enthusiasm in the classroom and in life beyond it. To that end, students of Le Petit Papillon Montessori School regularly journey to destinations in Miami Beach and neighboring communities to engage in activities that complement their academic endeavors.

In May 2012, for instance, students from kindergarten to fourth grade investigated the possibilities of graffiti as art at Wynwood Walls, an art park in Miami. In addition to talking about colors and designs, sketching their own drawings, and developing their sense of creativity, students were treated to a performance from Nestor Torres, a renowned jazz flutist.

Le Petit Papillon Montessori School holds accreditations by the Association of Independent Schools of Florida and SACS. To learn more about the school, visit www.lepetitpapillonmontessori.com.
